Description-hjz: Treat your customers with easy and delightful experience by getting in line remotely and eliminate costly pager losses by sending SMS when their table is ready.
Feature-Description-01: Let the customer join the waitlist remotely and wait from anywhere
Feature-Description-02: No need to hire special employees just to manage the customers and enter their information
Feature-Description-03: More than 60% of customers leave because of waiting in line, keep them now and increase your revenue
How-work-Description-01: The customer is going to scan the QR
How-work-Description-02: The customer will enter the waitlist
How-work-Description-03: Start tracking the waitlist and manage your customers
FAQ-Title-01: Does hjz require any specific device?
FAQ-Description-01: No, hjz work with all devices and no need to donwload any application.
FAQ-Title-02: Can I customize hjz by putting the restaurant logo or menu?
FAQ-Description-02: Yes, because hjz understand it's going to make your customers experience much better.
FAQ-Title-03: Is hjz help me to know more about my business?
FAQ-Description-03: Of course, you can check your rush hours, your loyal customers and use the data for advertising.
request-text-successful: Thank you, Hjz team will contact you soon.
